participant_1.background:
I immerse myself in the smell of my favorite soap to find solace.
i like to read.
I like to eat apples because they are healthy and sweet.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
i own a cat.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my work ethic and dedication to my craft.
i love pandas.
I want a modern and stylish home that reflects my vibrant personality.
I enjoy eating crêpes, a popular dish from my homeland, France.
I listen to music in my hearse before starting my day.

content.text: Hey!  I'm excited to meet you.
Hey there!  It's good to meet you too!
I'm always up for a good conversation.  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and travel.  I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
I love to read too!  What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I'm especially a fan of historical fiction and contemporary romance.  What about you?
I love historical fiction too!  It's so interesting to learn about different time periods and cultures.  I also enjoy reading thrillers and mysteries.
Oh my gosh!  I love thrillers and mysteries too!  Have you read any good ones lately?
I just finished reading "The Silent Patient" by Alex Michaelides.  It was really good!  Have you heard of it?
No, I haven't!  I'll have to check it out.  I just finished reading "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins.  It was really good!
I've heard good things about that book.  I'll have to add it to my list!
You should!  It's a really good thriller.
Thanks for the recommendation!  I'm always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome!  I love sharing books with people
